name: Superhero Sandbox (VR)
description:
This is a Virtual Reality Game.

This first release I call "I believe I can Fly!"

Walk with left joystick.

Turn with right joystick.

Push in left joystick to enable "Super Movement".

Make a fist by gripping the grip button on VR controller.

Fly in direction of fist.

Click left joystick again to land back on ground (WARNING: You fall VERY FAST if do it from high up)
